title.rendered: SD6AL245U-HNI Dahua 2MP 45X Starlight Laser PTZ Network Camera

content.rendered:
Make Dahua Technology
Manufacturer Dahua Technology Ltd
Model code SD6AL245U-HNI
Chip Inch Size 1/3 inch
Colour Type Colour / Monochrome
Resolution TVL 2 MP TVL resolution
Megapixel Yes
Sensitivity lux 0 ~ 0.005 lux
Dome Type PTZ
Pan Speed o/ sec 0.1 ~ 200 (Manual) ; 240 (Preset) o/ sec pan speed
Indoor/Outdoor Indoor/Outdoor
Digital (DSP) Yes
Tilt Speed o/ sec 0.1 ~ 120 (Manual) ; 200 (Preset) o/ sec tilt speed
Electrical Specifications Voltage: 24 V AC / Hi-PoE
Power Consumption: 24 W
Focal length 3.95mm~177.7mm
Presets 300
Compression H.265+/H.265/H.264+/H.264
Back Light Compensation Yes
Auto Gain Control Yes
White Balance Yes
Electronic Shutter range 1/1s~1/30,000s
S/ N (Signal/ Noise) Ratio dB > 56
Network Properties Interface: RJ-45 (10Base-T/100Base-TX)
Network Protocols: IPv4/IPv6,HTTP,HTTPS,SSL,TCP/IP, UDP,UPnP, ICMP,IGMP,SNMP,RTSP,RTP, SMTP, NTP,DHCP, DNS,PPPOE,DDNS,FTP, IP Filter,QoS,Bonjour,802.1x
Image Frame Rate: 50/60fps
Physical Specifications Dimensions mm: 240 x 357
Weight g: 6750
Environmental Specifications Operating Temp oC: -40 ~ +60 C (-40 ~ +140 F)
Operating Humidity %: < 90
Protection: IP67
System Requirments Web Browser: IE, Chrome, Firefox, Safari
Additional info
  • 1/2.8” 2Megapixel STARVIS™ CMOS
  • Powerful 45x optical zoom
  • Max. 50/60fps@1080P
  • Auto tracking and IVS
  • Support Hi-PoE
  • IR distance up to 550m
  • IP67
